info.title: GenePattern API
info.description: REST-ful API for the GenePattern server at https://cloud.genepattern.org. This can be used by programming language clients but it was originally created to back the javascript of the web application and some idiosyncrasies  of this API reflect that genesis.

post.description: Add a tag to a job

get.description: For Resumable.js use from the UI

post.description: For resumable.js multipart uploads from the UI

examples.text/plain: The main GenePattern server (cloud.genepattern.org) has a 1 hour maintenance window on the first Monday of each month from 2pm - 3pm PDT (UTC-7)  The next update will be Monday, September 7, 2020    Follow the GenePattern team on Twitter, Instagram or Facebook to keep up with the latest news and events or join the conversation in our forum!

post.description: Must be an admin to set the system message.

get.description: Get the status for multiple jobs at once

post.description: Edit a comment attached to a job.

get.description: Get the child jobs.  Applies to batch jobs or pipelines.
Used to write an error into the GenePattern server logs.
Gets an individual Genepattern configuration property

post.description: Provide a URL that will be called whenever job state changes.

get.description: Gets status of user disk quota.
